original_text: Then Zedekiah the son of Chenaanah came near and struck Micaiah on the cheek and said, “How did the Spirit of the Lord go from me to speak to you?”
korean_text: 그나아나의 아들 시드기야가 가까이 와서 미가야의 뺨을 치며 이르되 여호와의 영이 나를 떠나 어디로 가서 네게 말씀하시더냐

sentences.original_text: Then Zedekiah the son of Chenaanah came near
and struck Micaiah on the cheek
“How did the Spirit of the Lord go from me
